description: Lysandre`s Gyarados is alternate-colored and has a Gyaradosite so it can Mega Evolve. It was sent out to battle against Ash and Alain on top of the Prism Tower. It is an extremely powerful Pokémon and it was able to handily take out most of Ash`s Pokémon until it was finally weaken when it was mass attacked in turn by a lot of their Pokémon.
name: Gyarados (Fleur-de-lis)
